Ğ¡Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ¾Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ñ  [calmcode.io](https://calmcode.io/rich/introduction.html) Ğ¾Ñ‚ [@fishnets88](https://twitter.com/fishnets88).

ĞŸĞ¾ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ [Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ»ÑĞ´Ğ¸ Ğ´ÑƒĞ¼Ğ°ÑÑ‚ Ğ¾ Rich](https://www.willmcgugan.com/blog/pages/post/rich-tweets/).

## CĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ

Rich Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ñ Linux, OSX Ğ¸ Windows. True color / ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¶Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°ÑÑ‚ Ñ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¼ Windows, ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ» Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½ 16 Ñ†Ğ²ĞµÑ‚Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸. Rich Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ±ÑƒĞµÑ‚ Python 3.6.3 Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞµ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¹.

Rich Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ñ [Jupyter notebooks](https://jupyter.org/) Ğ±ĞµĞ· Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ³ÑƒÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸.

## Ğ£ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ°

Ğ£ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‰ÑŒÑ `pip` Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ PyPI Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ĞµĞ´Ğ¶ĞµÑ€Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ°ĞºĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ².

```sh
python -m pip install rich
```

Ğ—Ğ°Ğ¿ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑÑ‰ÑƒÑ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ñƒ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Rich Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ² Ğ²Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ¼ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ:

```sh
python -m rich
```

## Rich Print

ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ÑˆĞ¸Ğ¹ ÑĞ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ± Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´ [rich print](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/introduction.html#quick-start), Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ñ‹ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´ `print`. ĞŸĞ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±ÑƒĞ¹Ñ‚Ğµ:

```python
from rich import print

print("Hello, [bold magenta]World[/bold magenta]!", ":vampire:", locals())
```

![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/print.png)

## Rich REPL

Rich Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½ Ğ² Python REPL, Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº, Ğ²ÑĞµ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‹ Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ· Rich.

```python
>>> from rich import pretty
>>> pretty.install()
```

![REPL](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/repl.png)

## Ğ˜ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞ° Console

Ğ”Ğ»Ñ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¼ Rich, Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒĞ¹Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒĞ¹Ñ‚Ğµ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑ [Console](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console).

```python
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
```

Ğ£ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞ° Ğ¡onsole ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´ `print` ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ„ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ñ„ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ» `print`. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ:

```python
console.print("Hello", "World!")
```

ĞšĞ°Ğº Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ, ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµÑ‚ `Hello World!` Ğ² Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ». Ğ—Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾, Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ„ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ `print`, Rich Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‹ ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ²Ğ°Ñˆ Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑÑ‚ ÑĞ¾Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ²ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ» ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°.

Ğ•ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ½ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ ÑĞ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ñ†Ğ²ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒ Ğº Ğ²Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ¼Ñƒ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ñƒ. Ğ’Ñ‹ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ° Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ² Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ `style`. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€:

```python
console.print("Hello", "World!", style="bold red")
```

Ğ’Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ĞµÑ‚ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ³Ğ»ÑĞ´ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº:

![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/hello_world.png)

Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ 1 ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºÑƒ. Ğ”Ğ»Ñ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞµ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸, Rich Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·ÑƒĞµÑ‚ ÑĞ¿ĞµÑ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½ÑƒÑ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚ĞºÑƒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ¶ÑƒÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑĞ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑĞ¸ÑÑƒ Ğ½Ğ° [bbcode](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BBCode). Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€:

```python
console.print("Where there is a [bold cyan]Will[/bold cyan] there [u]is[/u] a [i]way[/i].")
```

![Console Markup](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/where_there_is_a_will.png)

Ğ’Ñ‹ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑ Console Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ³ĞµĞ½ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ ÑƒÑĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸. Ğ”Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ [Ğ´Ğ¾ĞºÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Console API](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/console.html).

## Rich Inspect

Ğ’ Rich Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ñ„ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ñ [inspect](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html?highlight=inspect#rich.inspect) ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ ÑƒĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¾Ğ¹ Python Ğ¾Ğ±ÑŠĞµĞºÑ‚, Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑ, Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ½ÑƒÑ, Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ñ„ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ñ.

```python
>>> my_list = ["foo", "bar"]
>>> from rich import inspect
>>> inspect(my_list, methods=True)
```

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/inspect.png)

Ğ”Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ [Ğ´Ğ¾ĞºÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ inspect](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html#rich.inspect).

# Ğ‘Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞºĞ° Rich

Rich ÑĞ¾Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ½ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… _Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ·ÑƒĞ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹_ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ ÑĞ´ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ² Ğ²Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ¼ CLI, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°ÑÑ‚ Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´ĞºĞµ ĞºĞ¾Ğ´Ğ°.

Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ½ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ²ĞµÑ‰ĞµĞ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Rich (Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ ÑƒĞ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞµ):

<details>
<summary>Ğ›Ğ¾Ğ³</summary>

Ğ’ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞµ Ğ¡onsole ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´ `log()` ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ñ„ĞµĞ¹Ñ, Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ `print()`, Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ½ĞºÑƒ Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑƒÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼ĞµĞ½ĞµĞ¼, Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ĞµĞ¼ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ğ´Ğ° Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ» Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ·Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´. ĞŸĞ¾ ÑƒĞ¼Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ‡Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Rich Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ÑĞ²ĞµÑ‡Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑĞ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑĞ¸Ñ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞºÑ‚ÑƒÑ€ Python Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğº repr. Ğ•ÑĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ² Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ»ĞµĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ñ (Ñ‚.Ğµ. dict Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ list) Rich Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµÑ‚ ĞµÑ‘ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑŒ Ğ² Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğµ. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°.

```python
from rich.console import Console
console = Console()

test_data = [
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "sum", "params": [None, 1, 2, 4, False, True], "id": "1",},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "notify_hello", "params": [7]},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "subtract", "params": [42, 23], "id": "2"},
]

def test_log():
    enabled = False
    context = {
        "foo": "bar",
    }
    movies = ["Deadpool", "Rise of the Skywalker"]
    console.log("Hello from", console, "!")
    console.log(test_data, log_locals=True)


test_log()
```

ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ²Ñ‹ÑˆĞµ ĞºĞ¾Ğ´ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµÑ‚ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾:

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/log.png)


ĞĞ±Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ `log_locals`, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñƒ, ÑĞ¾Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‰ÑƒÑ Ğ»Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ñ„ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ¸, Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ» Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ·Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´ log.

ĞœĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ° Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ² Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ» Ğ² Ğ´Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¼, Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¸Ñ… ĞºĞ°Ğº ÑĞµÑ€Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ğ°, Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‡ÑŒ Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´ĞºĞµ.

</details>
<details>
<summary>ĞĞ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğº Ğ›Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²</summary>

Ğ’Ñ‹ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ [ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑ Handler](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/logging.html) Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞºĞ¸ logging. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°:

![Logging](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/logging.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Ğ­Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¶Ğ¸</summary>

Ğ§Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¶Ğ¸ Ğ² Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ÑĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸, Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ´Ñƒ Ğ´Ğ²ÑƒĞ¼Ñ Ğ´Ğ²Ğ¾ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€:

```python
>>> console.print(":smiley: :vampire: :pile_of_poo: :thumbs_up: :raccoon:")
ğŸ˜ƒ ğŸ§› ğŸ’© ğŸ‘ ğŸ¦
```

ĞŸĞ¾Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ»ÑƒĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ°, Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·ÑƒĞ¹Ñ‚Ğµ ÑÑ‚Ñƒ Ñ„ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ñ Ñ ÑƒĞ¼Ğ¾Ğ¼.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹</summary>

Rich Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ±ĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ĞµĞ¼Ñ‹Ğµ [Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tables.html) Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‰ÑŒÑ ÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ² unicode. Ğ•ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞ¾Ğµ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†, ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»ĞµĞ¹, Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑÑ‡ĞµĞµĞº Ğ¸ Ñ‚.Ğ¿.

![table movie](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table_movie.gif)

Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ° ÑĞ³ĞµĞ½ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‰ÑŒÑ [table_movie.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/table_movie.py) Ğ² Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ¿ĞºĞµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ².

Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.table import Table

console = Console()

table = Table(show_header=True, header_style="bold magenta")
table.add_column("Date", style="dim", width=12)
table.add_column("Title")
table.add_column("Production Budget", justify="right")
table.add_column("Box Office", justify="right")
table.add_row(
    "Dec 20, 2019", "Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker", "$275,000,000", "$375,126,118"
)
table.add_row(
    "May 25, 2018",
    "[red]Solo[/red]: A Star Wars Story",
    "$275,000,000",
    "$393,151,347",
)
table.add_row(
    "Dec 15, 2017",
    "Star Wars Ep. VIII: The Last Jedi",
    "$262,000,000",
    "[bold]$1,332,539,889[/bold]",
)

console.print(table)
```

Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚:

![table](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table.png)

ĞĞ±Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚ĞºĞ° Ğ¾ÑÑƒÑ‰ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¶Ğµ ÑĞ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ¼, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¸ `print()` Ğ¸ `log()`. ĞĞ° ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğµ, Ğ²ÑĞµ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¾ Rich, Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ²ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ² Ğ·Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ¸ / ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸ (Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ² Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹).

ĞšĞ»Ğ°ÑÑ `Table` Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ ÑƒĞ¼Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ±Ñ†Ğ¾Ğ², Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ÑĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ½ÑƒÑ ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ñƒ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°, Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‘Ñ€Ñ‚Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°Ñ Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑÑ‚ ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ½ÑƒĞ¶Ğ½Ğ¾. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¶Ğµ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ Ñ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ÑŒÑˆĞµ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹:

![table2](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table2.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€ĞµÑÑ Ğ‘Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‹</summary>

Rich Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ½ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… [Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€ĞµÑÑ](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/progress.html) Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ² Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑĞ»ĞµĞ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ³Ğ¾-Ğ¸Ğ´ÑƒÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ.

Ğ”Ğ»Ñ Ğ±Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ, Ğ¾Ğ±ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ»ÑĞ±ÑƒÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ² Ñ„ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ñ `track` Ğ¸ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ñ€ĞµĞ·ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ñƒ. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€:

```python
from rich.progress import track

for step in track(range(100)):
    do_step(step)
```

Ğ”Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ½ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½ĞµĞµ. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ Ğ²Ğ·ÑÑ‚Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ´Ğ¾ĞºÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸:

![progress](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/progress.gif)

Ğ¡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ±Ñ†Ñ‹ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ³ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‹ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ¼, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ñ‹Ğµ ÑĞ²ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ²Ñ‹ Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ. Ğ¡Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ±Ñ†Ñ‹ ÑĞ¾Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ†ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ñ‹ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ, Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ñ‹, ÑĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²ÑˆĞµĞµÑÑ Ğ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ñ. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ ĞµÑ‰Ñ‘ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ Ğ¿Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€ĞµÑÑ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ·ĞºĞ¸:

![progress](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/downloader.gif)

Ğ§Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ, ÑĞºĞ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğµ [examples/downloader.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/downloader.py), ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ½ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ URL-Ğ°Ğ´Ñ€ĞµÑĞ¾Ğ² Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾, Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€ĞµÑÑ.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Ğ¡Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ‚ÑƒÑ</summary>

Ğ”Ğ»Ñ ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ÑƒĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ³Ğ´Ğµ ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€ĞµÑÑ, Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´ [ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚ÑƒÑ](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console.status) ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞºÑ€ÑƒÑ‚ÑÑ‰ÑƒÑÑÑ Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ ÑĞ¾Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‰ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ. ĞĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼ĞµÑˆĞ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ÑĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒ Ğ² Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ñ€ĞµĞ¶Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğµ. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€:

```python
from time import sleep
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
tasks = [f"task {n}" for n in range(1, 11)]

with console.status("[bold green]Working on tasks...") as status:
    while tasks:
        task = tasks.pop(0)
        sleep(1)
        console.log(f"{task} complete")
```

Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾ ÑĞ³ĞµĞ½ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒĞµÑ‚ Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ÑĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒ.

![status](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/status.gif)

ĞšÑ€ÑƒÑ‚ÑÑ‰Ğ¸ĞµÑÑ Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ·ÑÑ‚Ñ‹ Ğ¸Ğ· [cli-spinners](https://www.npmjs.com/package/cli-spinners). Ğ’Ñ‹ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ñƒ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ… ÑƒĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ğ² Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ñ€ `spinner`. Ğ’Ğ²ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑÑ‰ÑƒÑ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ñƒ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸:

```
python -m rich.spinner
```

ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ°Ñ Ğ²Ñ‹ÑˆĞµ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ° ÑĞ³ĞµĞ½ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒĞµÑ‚ ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ² Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ:

![spinners](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/spinners.gif)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Ğ”ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ²Ğ¾</summary>

Rich Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ [Ğ´ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ²Ğ¾](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tree.html) Ñ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ÑÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸ ÑƒÑ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½ÑĞ¼Ğ¸. Ğ”ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ²Ğ¾ Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞºÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ñ‹ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¸ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ€Ñ…Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ….

ĞœĞµÑ‚ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ²Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑĞ¾Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑÑ‚ Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ñ‡ĞµĞ¼-Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¾ ĞµÑ‰Ğµ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Rich. Ğ—Ğ°Ğ¿ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑÑ‰ÑƒÑ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ñƒ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµĞ¼Ğ¾Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸:

```
python -m rich.tree
```

Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ³ĞµĞ½ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒĞµÑ‚ ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´:

![markdown](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/tree.png)

Ğ¡Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ [tree.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/tree.py) ÑĞºÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¿Ñ‚Ğ°,ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ´Ñ€ĞµĞ²Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°, Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğµ linux `tree`.

</details>

<details>
<summary>ĞšĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ½ĞºĞ¸</summary>

Rich Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ² Ğ°ĞºĞºÑƒÑ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… [ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ½ĞºĞ°Ñ…](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/columns.html) Ñ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ ĞºĞ»Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ñ‹ `ls` (MacOS / Linux) ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ ÑĞ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğº Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ¿ĞºĞ¸ Ğ² Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ´Ğµ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğº:

```python
import os
import sys

from rich import print
from rich.columns import Columns

directory = os.listdir(sys.argv[1])
print(Columns(directory))
```

Ğ¡Ğ»ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğº ÑĞºÑ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° ÑĞ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ [Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğº](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/columns.py) ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ²Ğ·ÑÑ‚Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ· API Ğ² ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ±Ñ†Ğ°Ñ…:

![columns](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/columns.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Markdown</summary>

Rich Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ [markdown](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/markdown.html), Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°Ñ Ğ½ĞµĞ¿Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ…ÑƒÑ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñƒ Ğ² Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ».

Ğ§Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ markdown Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒĞ¹Ñ‚Ğµ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑ `Markdown` Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒĞ¹Ñ‚Ğµ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‰ÑŒÑ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸ ÑĞ¾Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‰ĞµĞ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ğ´ markdown. Ğ—Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ¼ Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¿ĞµÑ‡Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğµ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ÑĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.markdown import Markdown

console = Console()
with open("README.md") as readme:
    markdown = Markdown(readme.read())
console.print(markdown)
```

Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµÑ‚ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾-Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞµ Ğ½Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ¾:

![markdown](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/markdown.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>ĞŸĞ¾Ğ´ÑĞ²ĞµÑ‚ĞºĞ° ÑĞ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑĞ¸ÑĞ°</summary>

Rich Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·ÑƒĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑƒ [pygments](https://pygments.org/) Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ [Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ÑĞ²ĞµÑ‚ĞºÑƒ ÑĞ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑĞ¸ÑĞ°](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/syntax.html). Ğ˜ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ñƒ markdown; ÑĞ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ±ÑŠĞµĞºÑ‚ `Syntax` Ğ¸ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ° ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ÑĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒ. Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.syntax import Syntax

my_code = '''
def iter_first_last(values: Iterable[T]) -> Iterable[Tuple[bool, bool, T]]:
    """Iterate and generate a tuple with a flag for first and last value."""
    iter_values = iter(values)
    try:
        previous_value = next(iter_values)
    except StopIteration:
        return
    first = True
    for value in iter_values:
        yield first, False, previous_value
        first = False
        previous_value = value
    yield first, True, previous_value
'''
syntax = Syntax(my_code, "python", theme="monokai", line_numbers=True)
console = Console()
console.print(syntax)
```

Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµÑ‚ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾-Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞµ Ğ½Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ¾:

![syntax](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/syntax.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>ĞÑˆĞ¸Ğ±ĞºĞ¸</summary>

Rich Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ [ĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¹ ÑÑ‚ĞµĞº Ğ¾ÑˆĞ¸Ğ±Ğ¾Ğº](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/traceback.html), ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‰Ğµ Ñ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ, Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞµ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ñ‡ĞµĞ¼ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ ÑÑ‚ĞµĞº Ğ¾ÑˆĞ¸Ğ±Ğ¾Ğº Python. Ğ’Ñ‹ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Rich ĞºĞ°Ğº ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¾ÑˆĞ¸Ğ±Ğ¾Ğº Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ²ÑĞµ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµÑ…Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¸ÑĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑŒ Rich.

Ğ’Ğ¾Ñ‚ ĞºĞ°Ğº ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ³Ğ»ÑĞ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ½Ğ° OSX (Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ½Ğ° Linux):

Ğ’ÑĞµ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ·ÑƒĞ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Rich Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·ÑƒÑÑ‚ [Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾ĞºĞ¾Ğ» Console](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/protocol.html), ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ÑÑ‚ÑŒ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞ¾Ğ±ÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Rich ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞ½Ñ‚.

Ğ¡Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ [Rich CLI](https://github.com/textualize/rich-cli) Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸, Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°ÑÑ‰ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ±Ğ°Ğ·Ğµ Rich. ĞŸĞ¾Ğ´ÑĞ²ĞµÑ‚ĞºĞ° ÑĞ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑĞ¸ÑĞ° ĞºĞ¾Ğ´Ğ°, Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ markdown, Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ CSV-Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ°Ñ… Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ½ĞµĞ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¸Ğ· ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸.

Rich Ã¤r ett Python bibliotek fÃ¶r _rich_ text och vacker formattering i terminalen.

[Rich API](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) gÃ¶r det enkelt att lÃ¤gga till fÃ¤rg och stil till terminal utmatning. Rich kan ocksÃ¥ framstÃ¤lla fina tabeller, framstegsfÃ¤lt, mÃ¤rksprÃ¥k, syntaxmarkerad kÃ¤llkod, tillbaka-spÃ¥rning, och mera - redo att anvÃ¤nda.

![Funktioner](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/features.png)

FÃ¶r en video demonstration av Rich kolla [calmcode.io](https://calmcode.io/rich/introduction.html) av [@fishnets88](https://twitter.com/fishnets88).

Se vad [folk pratar om Rich](https://www.willmcgugan.com/blog/pages/post/rich-tweets/).

## Kompatibilitet

Rich funkar med Linux, OSX, och Windows. Sann fÃ¤rg / emoji funkar med nya Windows Terminalen, klassiska terminal Ã¤r begrÃ¤nsad till 8 fÃ¤rger. Rich krÃ¤ver Python 3.6.3 eller senare.

Rich funkar med [Jupyter notebooks](https://jupyter.org/) utan nÃ¥gon ytterligare konfiguration behÃ¶vd.

## Installering

Installera med `pip` eller din favorita PyPI packet hanterare.

```sh
python -m pip install rich
```

KÃ¶r fÃ¶ljade fÃ¶ljande fÃ¶r att testa Rich utmatning i din terminal:

```sh
python -m rich
```

## Rich utskrivningsfunktion

FÃ¶r att enkelt lÃ¤gga till rich utmatning i din applikation, kan du importera [rich print](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/introduction.html#quick-start) metoden, vilket har den samma signatur som den inbyggda Python funktionen. Testa detta:

```python
from rich import print

print("Hello, [bold magenta]World[/bold magenta]!", ":vampire:", locals())
```

![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/print.png)

## Rich REPL

Rich kan installeras i Python REPL, sÃ¥ att varje datastruktur kommer att skrivas ut fint och markeras.

```python
>>> from rich import pretty
>>> pretty.install()
```

![REPL](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/repl.png)

## AnvÃ¤ndning av konsolen

FÃ¶r mer kontroll Ã¶ver rich terminal innehÃ¥llsutmatning, importera och konstruera ett [Console](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console) objekt.

```python
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
```

`Console` objektet har en `print` metod vilket har ett avsiktligt liknande grÃ¤nssnitt till den inbyggda `print` funktionen. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel av anvÃ¤ndningen:

```python
console.print("Hello", "World!")
```

Som du mÃ¶jligtvis anar, detta kommer skriva ut `"Hello World!"` till terminalen. Notera att till skillnad frÃ¥n den inbyggda `print` funktionen, Rich kommer att radbryta din text sÃ¥ att den passar inom terminalbredden.

Det finns ett par sÃ¤tt att lÃ¤gga till fÃ¤rg och stil till din utmatning. Du kan sÃ¤tta en stil fÃ¶r hela utmatningen genom att addera ett `style` nyckelord argument. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel:

```python
console.print("Hello", "World!", style="bold red")
```

Utmatningen kommer bli nÃ¥got liknande:

![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/hello_world.png)

Det Ã¤r bra fÃ¶r att ge stil till en textrad Ã¥t gÃ¥ngen. FÃ¶r mer finkornad stilisering, Rich framstÃ¤ller en speciell mÃ¤rksprÃ¥k vilket liknar [bbcode](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BBCode) i syntax. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel:

```python
console.print("Where there is a [bold cyan]Will[/bold cyan] there [u]is[/u] a [i]way[/i].")
```

![Konsol mÃ¤rksprÃ¥k](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/where_there_is_a_will.png)

Du kan anvÃ¤nda ett `Console` objekt fÃ¶r att generera sofistikerad utmatning med minimal anstrÃ¤ngning. Se [Console API](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/console.html) dokument fÃ¶r detaljer.

## Rich Inspektera

Rich har en [inspektionsfunktion](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html?highlight=inspect#rich.inspect) som kan producera en rapport om vilket Python objekt som helst, till exempel klass, instans, eller inbyggt.

```python
>>> my_list = ["foo", "bar"]
>>> from rich import inspect
>>> inspect(my_list, methods=True)
```

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/inspect.png)

See [inspektionsdokumentationen](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html#rich.inspect) fÃ¶r detaljer.

# Rich Library

Rich innehÃ¥ller ett antal av inbyggda _renderables_ som du kan anvÃ¤nda fÃ¶r att skapa elegant utmatning i din kommandotolk och hjÃ¤lpa dig felsÃ¶ka din kod.

Klicka pÃ¥ fÃ¶ljande rubriker fÃ¶r detaljer:

<details>
<summary>Logga</summary>

`Console` objektet har en `log()` metod vilket har liknande grÃ¤nssnitt som `print()`, men framstÃ¤ller Ã¤ven en kolumn fÃ¶r den nuvarande tid och fil samt rad vilket gjorde anroppet. Som standard kommer Rich att markera syntax fÃ¶r Python strukturer och fÃ¶r repr strÃ¤ngar. Ifall du loggar en samling (det vill sÃ¤ga en ordbok eller en lista) kommer Rich att finskriva ut det sÃ¥ att det passar i det tillgÃ¤ngliga utrymme. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel av dessa funktioner.

```python
from rich.console import Console
console = Console()

test_data = [
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "sum", "params": [None, 1, 2, 4, False, True], "id": "1",},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "notify_hello", "params": [7]},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "subtract", "params": [42, 23], "id": "2"},
]

def test_log():
    enabled = False
    context = {
        "foo": "bar",
    }
    movies = ["Deadpool", "Rise of the Skywalker"]
    console.log("Hello from", console, "!")
    console.log(test_data, log_locals=True)


test_log()
```

Det ovanstÃ¥ende har fÃ¶ljande utmatning:

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/log.png)

Notera `log_locals` argumentet, vilket utmatar en tabell innehÃ¥llandes de lokala variablerna varifrÃ¥n log metoden kallades frÃ¥n.

Log metoden kan anvÃ¤ndas fÃ¶r att logga till terminal fÃ¶r lÃ¥ngkÃ¶rande applikationer sÃ¥ som servrar, men Ã¤r ocksÃ¥ en vÃ¤ldigt bra felsÃ¶kningsverktyg.

</details>
<details>
<summary>Loggningshanterare</summary>

Du kan ocksÃ¥ anvÃ¤nda den inbyggda [Handler klassen](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/logging.html) fÃ¶r att formatera och fÃ¤rglÃ¤gga utmatningen frÃ¥n Pythons loggningsmodul. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel av utmatningen:

![Loggning](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/logging.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Emoji</summary>

FÃ¶r att infoga en emoji till konsolutmatningen placera namnet mellan tvÃ¥ kolon. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel:

```python
>>> console.print(":smiley: :vampire: :pile_of_poo: :thumbs_up: :raccoon:")
ğŸ˜ƒ ğŸ§› ğŸ’© ğŸ‘ ğŸ¦
```

VÃ¤nligen anvÃ¤nd denna funktion klokt.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tabeller</summary>

Rich kan framstÃ¤lla flexibla [tabeller](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tables.html) med unicode boxkaraktÃ¤rer. Det finns en stor mÃ¤ngd av formateringsalternativ fÃ¶r grÃ¤nser, stilar, och celljustering etc.

![Tabell film](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table_movie.gif)

Animationen ovan genererades utav [table_movie.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/table_movie.py) i exempelkatalogen.

HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel av en enklare tabell:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.table import Table

console = Console()

table = Table(show_header=True, header_style="bold magenta")
table.add_column("Date", style="dim", width=12)
table.add_column("Title")
table.add_column("Production Budget", justify="right")
table.add_column("Box Office", justify="right")
table.add_row(
    "Dec 20, 2019", "Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker", "$275,000,000", "$375,126,118"
)
table.add_row(
    "May 25, 2018",
    "[red]Solo[/red]: A Star Wars Story",
    "$275,000,000",
    "$393,151,347",
)
table.add_row(
    "Dec 15, 2017",
    "Star Wars Ep. VIII: The Last Jedi",
    "$262,000,000",
    "[bold]$1,332,539,889[/bold]",
)

console.print(table)
```

Detta producerar fÃ¶ljande utmatning:

![tabell](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table.png)

Notera att konsol mÃ¤rksprÃ¥k Ã¤r framstÃ¤llt pÃ¥ samma sÃ¤tt som `print()` och `log()`. I sjÃ¤lva verket, vad som helst som Ã¤r framstÃ¤llt av Rich kan inkluderas i rubriker / rader (Ã¤ven andra tabeller).

`Table` klassen Ã¤r smart nog att storleksÃ¤ndra kolumner att passa den tillgÃ¤ngliga bredden av terminalen, och slÃ¥r in text ifall det behÃ¶vs. HÃ¤r Ã¤r samma exempel, med terminalen gjord mindre Ã¤n tabell ovan:

![tabell2](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table2.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>FramstegsfÃ¤lt</summary>

Rich kan framstÃ¤lla flera flimmerfria [framstegsfÃ¤lt](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/progress.html) fÃ¶r att fÃ¶lja lÃ¥ngvariga uppgifter.

FÃ¶r grundlÃ¤ggande anvÃ¤ndning, slÃ¥ in valfri sekvens i `track` funktion och iterera Ã¶ver resultatet. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel:

```python
from rich.progress import track

for step in track(range(100)):
    do_step(step)
```

Det Ã¤r inte mycket svÃ¥rare att lÃ¤gga till flera framstegsfÃ¤lt. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel tagen frÃ¥n dokumentationen:

![framsteg](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/progress.gif)

Dessa kolumner kan konfigureras att visa vilka detaljer du vill. Inbyggda kolumner inkluderar procentuell fÃ¤rdig, filstorlek, filhastighet, och Ã¥terstÃ¥ende tid. HÃ¤r Ã¤r Ã¤nnu ett exempel som visar en pÃ¥gÃ¥ende nedladdning:

![framsteg](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/downloader.gif)

FÃ¶r att sjÃ¤lv testa detta, kolla [examples/downloader.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/downloader.py) vilket kan ladda ner flera URLs samtidigt medan visar framsteg.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Status</summary>

FÃ¶r situationer dÃ¤r det Ã¤r svÃ¥rt att berÃ¤kna framsteg, kan du anvÃ¤nda [status](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console.status) metoden vilket kommer visa en 'snurra' animation och meddelande. Animationen hindrar dig inte frÃ¥n att anvÃ¤nda konsolen som normalt. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel:

```python
from time import sleep
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
tasks = [f"task {n}" for n in range(1, 11)]

with console.status("[bold green]Working on tasks...") as status:
    while tasks:
        task = tasks.pop(0)
        sleep(1)
        console.log(f"{task} complete")
```

Detta genererar fÃ¶ljande utmatning i terminalen.

![status](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/status.gif)

Snurra animationen Ã¤r lÃ¥nad ifrÃ¥n [cli-spinners](https://www.npmjs.com/package/cli-spinners). Du kan vÃ¤lja en snurra genom att specifiera `spinner` parametern. KÃ¶r fÃ¶ljande kommando fÃ¶r att se tillgÃ¤ngliga vÃ¤rden:

```
python -m rich.spinner
```

Kommandot ovan genererar fÃ¶ljande utmatning i terminalen:

![Snurror](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/spinners.gif)

</details>

<details>
<summary>TrÃ¤d</summary>

Rich kan framstÃ¤lla ett [trÃ¤d](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tree.html) med riktlinjer. Ett trÃ¤d Ã¤r idealt fÃ¶r att visa en filstruktur, eller andra hierarkiska data.

Etiketter pÃ¥ trÃ¤det kan vara enkelt text eller nÃ¥got annat som Rich kan framstÃ¤lla. KÃ¶r fÃ¶ljande fÃ¶r en demonstration:

```
python -m rich.tree
```

Detta genererar fÃ¶ljande utmatning:

![mÃ¤rksprÃ¥k](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/tree.png)

Se [tree.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/tree.py) exemplet fÃ¶r ett skript som visar en trÃ¤dvy av vilken katalog som helst, som liknar linux `tree` kommandot.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Kolumner</summary>

Rich kan framstÃ¤lla innehÃ¥ll i prydliga [kolumner](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/columns.html) med lika eller optimal bredd. HÃ¤r Ã¤r en grundlÃ¤ggande klon av (MacOS / Linux) `ls` kommandot vilket visar en kataloglista i kolumner:

```python
import os
import sys

from rich import print
from rich.columns import Columns

directory = os.listdir(sys.argv[1])
print(Columns(directory))
```

FÃ¶ljande skÃ¤rmdump Ã¤r resultatet frÃ¥n [kolumner exempelet](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/columns.py) vilket visar data tagen frÃ¥n ett API i kolumner:

![kolumner](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/columns.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>MÃ¤rksprÃ¥k</summary>

Rich kan framstÃ¤lla [mÃ¤rksprÃ¥k](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/markdown.html) och gÃ¶r ett rimligt jobb med att Ã¶versÃ¤tta formateringen till terminalen.

FÃ¶r att framstÃ¤lla mÃ¤rksprÃ¥k importera `Markdown` klassen och konstruera den med en strÃ¤ng innehÃ¥llandes mÃ¤rksprÃ¥kskod. Mata sedan ut det till konsolen. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.markdown import Markdown

console = Console()
with open("README.md") as readme:
    markdown = Markdown(readme.read())
console.print(markdown)
```

Detta kommer att producera utmatning som liknar fÃ¶ljande:

![mÃ¤rksprÃ¥k](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/markdown.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Syntaxmarkering</summary>

Rich anvÃ¤nder [pygments](https://pygments.org/) biblioteket fÃ¶r att implementera [syntax markering](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/syntax.html). AnvÃ¤ndningen Ã¤r liknande till framstÃ¤lla mÃ¤rksprÃ¥k; konstruera ett `Syntax` objekt och skriv ut den till konsolen. HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett exempel:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.syntax import Syntax

my_code = '''
def iter_first_last(values: Iterable[T]) -> Iterable[Tuple[bool, bool, T]]:
    """Iterate and generate a tuple with a flag for first and last value."""
    iter_values = iter(values)
    try:
        previous_value = next(iter_values)
    except StopIteration:
        return
    first = True
    for value in iter_values:
        yield first, False, previous_value
        first = False
        previous_value = value
    yield first, True, previous_value
'''
syntax = Syntax(my_code, "python", theme="monokai", line_numbers=True)
console = Console()
console.print(syntax)
```

Detta kommer producera fÃ¶ljande utmatning:

![syntax](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/syntax.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tillbaka-spÃ¥rning</summary>

Rich kan framstÃ¤lla [vackra tillbaka-spÃ¥rningar](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/traceback.html) vilket Ã¤r enklare att lÃ¤sa och visar mer kod Ã¤n vanliga Python tillbaka-spÃ¥rningar. Du kan sÃ¤tta Rich som standard tillbaka-spÃ¥rningshanterare sÃ¥ att alla ofÃ¥ngade undantag kommer att framstÃ¤llas av Rich.

SÃ¥ hÃ¤r ser det ut pÃ¥ OSX (liknande pÃ¥ Linux):

![traceback](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/traceback.png)

</details>

Alla Rich framstÃ¤llsbara anvÃ¤nder sig av [konsolprotokollet](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/protocol.html), som du ocksÃ¥ kan anvÃ¤nda fÃ¶r att implementera ditt eget Rich-innehÃ¥ll.

# Rich fÃ¶r fÃ¶retag

TillgÃ¤nglig som en del av Tidelift-prenumerationen.

UnderhÃ¥llarna av Rich och tusentals andra paket arbetar med Tidelift fÃ¶r att leverera kommersiellt stÃ¶d och underhÃ¥ll fÃ¶r de Ã¶ppen kÃ¤llkodspaket som du kan anvÃ¤nda fÃ¶r att bygga dina applikationer. Spara tid, reducera risk, och fÃ¶rbÃ¤ttra kodhÃ¤lsan, samtidigt som du betalar underhÃ¥llarna fÃ¶r exakt de paket du anvÃ¤nder [LÃ¤r dig mer.](https://tidelift.com/subscription/pkg/pypi-rich?utm_source=pypi-rich&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=enterprise&utm_term=repo)

# Projekt som anvÃ¤nder sig av Rich

HÃ¤r Ã¤r ett par projekt som anvÃ¤nder Rich:

- [BrancoLab/BrainRender](https://github.com/BrancoLab/BrainRender)
  ett python packet fÃ¶r visualisering av tredimensionell neuro-anatomiska data
- [Ciphey/Ciphey](https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey)
  Automatiserat dekrypteringsverktyg

  en hÃ¶gpresterande processor med hÃ¶g precision och minnesprofilerare fÃ¶r Python
- [hedythedev/StarCli](https://github.com/hedythedev/starcli)
  BlÃ¤ddra bland trendande projekt i Github frÃ¥n din kommandotolk
- [intel/cve-bin-tool](https://github.com/intel/cve-bin-tool)
  Detta verktyg skannar efter vanliga, sÃ¥rbara komponenter (openssl, libpng, libxml2, expat och en del andra) fÃ¶r att lÃ¥ta dig veta ifall ditt system inkluderar vanliga bibliotek med kÃ¤nda sÃ¥rbarheter.
- [nf-core/tools](https://github.com/nf-core/tools)
  Python packet med hjÃ¤lpverktyg fÃ¶r nf-core gemenskapen.
- [cansarigol/pdbr](https://github.com/cansarigol/pdbr)
  pdb + Rich bibliotek fÃ¶r fÃ¶rbÃ¤ttrad felsÃ¶kning.

  Satellitbilder fÃ¶r nybÃ¶rjare.
- [seleniumbase/SeleniumBase](https://github.com/seleniumbase/SeleniumBase)
  Automatisera & testa 10x snabbare med Selenium & pytest. Batterier inkluderat.
- [smacke/ffsubsync](https://github.com/smacke/ffsubsync)
  Automagiskt synkronisera undertexter med video.
- [tryolabs/norfair](https://github.com/tryolabs/norfair)
  LÃ¤ttvikt Python bibliotek fÃ¶r att addera 2d-objektspÃ¥rning i realtid till vilken detektor som helst.
- [ansible/ansible-lint](https://github.com/ansible/ansible-lint) Ansible-lint kontroller playbooks fÃ¶r dess metoder och beteenden som potentiellt kan fÃ¶rbÃ¤ttras
- [ansible-community/molecule](https://github.com/ansible-community/molecule) Ansible Molecule ramverk fÃ¶r testning
- +[Many more](https://github.com/textualize/rich/network/dependents)!

 â€¢ [ÙØ§Ø±Ø³ÛŒ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.fa.md)
 â€¢ [TÃ¼rkÃ§e readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.tr.md)
 â€¢ [Polskie readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.pl.md)


Bir Python kÃ¼tÃ¼phanesi olan __rich__, terminal Ã¼zerinde gÃ¶steriÅŸli Ã§Ä±ktÄ±lar almanÄ±zÄ± saÄŸlayan bir araÃ§tÄ±r.

[Rich API](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) kullanarak terminal Ã§Ä±ktÄ±larÄ±nÄ±za stil ekleyebilir ve renklendirebilirsiniz. AynÄ± zamanda tablolarÄ±, ilerleme Ã§ubuklarÄ±nÄ±, markdown stillerini, kaynak koddaki sÃ¶z dizimi gÃ¶sterimlerini ve bir Ã§ok ÅŸeyi rich kullanarak yapabilirsiniz.

![Features](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/features.png)

Rich'e video ile gÃ¶z atmak iÃ§in [@fishnets88](https://twitter.com/fishnets88) tarafÄ±ndan oluÅŸturulan [calmcode.io](https://calmcode.io/rich/introduction.html) sitesine bakabilirsiniz.

Ä°nsanlarÄ±n [rich hakkÄ±nda yazdÄ±klarÄ± son yazÄ±lar](https://www.willmcgugan.com/blog/pages/post/rich-tweets).

## Uyumluluk

Rich Linux, OSX ve Windows Ã¼zerinde Ã§alÄ±ÅŸabilir. Windows'un yeni terminalinde de doÄŸru bir ÅŸekilde Ã§alÄ±ÅŸabilir, eski terminalde 16 renk olduÄŸu iÃ§in istenilen sonuÃ§lar elde edilemeyebilir. AynÄ± zamanda Rich'in Ã§alÄ±ÅŸabilmesi iÃ§in ortamda minimum Python 3.6.3 veya daha yeni bir sÃ¼rÃ¼m olmasÄ± gerekmektedir.

Rich [Jupyter notebook](https://jupyter.org/) Ã¼zerinde hiÃ§ bir ek yÃ¼kleme gerektirmeden Ã§alÄ±ÅŸabilir.

## YÃ¼kleme

`pip` Ã¼zerinden veya kullanmÄ±ÅŸ olduÄŸunuz PyPI paket yÃ¶neticiniz Ã¼zerinden indirebilirsiniz.

```sh
python -m pip install rich
```

AÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki komut satÄ±rÄ±nÄ± Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rarak Ã§Ä±ktÄ±nÄ±zÄ± terminal Ã¼zerinden gÃ¶rebilirsiniz.


```sh
python -m rich
```

## Rich Print

[rich print](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/introduction.html#quick-start) methodunu yÃ¼kleyerek, Rich'i kullanmaya baÅŸlayabilirsiniz.

```python
from rich import print

print("Merhaba, [bold magenta]DÃ¼nya[/bold magenta]!", ":vampire:", locals())
```

Buradaki yazÄ±yÄ± deÄŸiÅŸtiremediÄŸim iÃ§in siz hello world olarak gÃ¶rÃ¼yorsunuz. :D
![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/print.png)

## Rich REPL

Rich Python REPL iÃ§erisine yÃ¼klenebilir, bÃ¶ylece herhangi bir veri tipini gÃ¼zelce terminal Ã§Ä±ktÄ±sÄ± olarak verebilir.

```python
>>> from rich import pretty
>>> pretty.install()
```

![REPL](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/repl.png)

## Terminali NasÄ±l KullanÄ±lÄ±r?

Ã‡Ä±ktÄ±larÄ±nÄ±z Ã¼zerinde daha fazla hakimiyet kurmak isterseniz, [Console](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console)'u import edip objesini kullanabilirsiniz.

```python
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
```

Console objesi tÄ±pkÄ± Python iÃ§erisinde hazÄ±r gelen `print` methoduna benziyor, tabii daha fazlasÄ± da var.
KullanÄ±mÄ± aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki Ã¶rnek gibi olacaktÄ±r:

```python
console.print("Merhaba", "DÃ¼nya!")
```

Sizin de tahmin edebileceÄŸiniz gibi terminal Ã§Ä±ktÄ±mÄ±z `"Merhaba DÃ¼nya!"` olacaktÄ±r. Standart `print` fonksiyonundan farklÄ± olarak Console `print` fonksiyonu terminale sÄ±ÄŸmayan yazÄ±larÄ± kaydÄ±rma Ã¶zelliÄŸine sahiptir.

YazÄ±larÄ±mÄ±za birden fazla ÅŸekilde renk ekleyebiliriz. Bunlardan ek basit olan ÅŸekli, `style` argÃ¼manÄ±na rengimizi vermek. AÅŸaÄŸÄ±da nasÄ±l kullanÄ±lacaÄŸÄ±na dair bir Ã¶rnek bulabilirsiniz.

```python
console.print("Merhaba", "DÃ¼nya!", style="bold red")
```

EÄŸer Ã§Ä±ktÄ±yÄ± deÄŸiÅŸtirmeseydim aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki gibi bir gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼ ile karÅŸÄ±laÅŸacaktÄ±nÄ±z:

![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/hello_world.png)

Tek seferde bir yazÄ±yÄ± renklendirmek iÃ§in kullanÄ±ÅŸlÄ± bir yÃ¶ntem olsa da, eÄŸer Ã§Ä±ktÄ±mÄ±zÄ±n sadece belirli bÃ¶lgelerinde deÄŸiÅŸiklik yapacaksak [bbcode](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BBCode) sÃ¶z dizimini kullanmalÄ±yÄ±z. Bunun iÃ§in de bir Ã¶rnek:

```python
console.print("[bold red]Mustafa Kemal AtatÃ¼rk[/bold red] [u](1881 - 10 KasÄ±m 1938)[/u], [i]TÃ¼rk asker ve devlet adamÄ±dÄ±r[/i]. [bold cyan]TÃ¼rk KurtuluÅŸ SavaÅŸÄ±'nÄ±n baÅŸkomutanÄ± ve TÃ¼rkiye Cumhuriyeti'nin kurucusudur[/bold cyan].")
```

![Console Markup](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/where_there_is_a_will.png)

Console objesini kullanarak sofistike bir Ã§ok Ã§Ä±ktÄ±yÄ± minimum efor ile oluÅŸturabilirsiniz. [Console API](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/console.html) dÃ¶kÃ¼manÄ±na gÃ¶z atarak daha fazla bilgi elde edebilirsiniz.

## Rich Inspect

Rich [inspect](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html?highlight=inspect#rich.inspect) adÄ±nda bir fonksiyona sahiptir ve bu fonksiyon bize bir Python objesininin Ã¶zelliklerini gÃ¶sterir.

```python
>>> my_list = ["foo", "bar"]
>>> from rich import inspect
>>> inspect(my_list, methods=True)
```

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/inspect.png)

[Bu dÃ¶kÃ¼mana](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html#rich.inspect) gÃ¶z atarak daha fazla bilgi elde edebilirsiniz...

# Rich KÃ¼tÃ¼phaneleri

Rich iÃ§erisinde terminal Ã¼zerinde kullandÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ±zda Ã§Ä±ktÄ±larÄ±nÄ±zÄ± gÃ¶steriÅŸli kÄ±lacak Ã§ok fazla yapÄ±ya sahiptir.

Bu yapÄ±larÄ±n detaylarÄ± iÃ§in ilgili baÅŸlÄ±klara tÄ±klayÄ±n:

<details>
<summary>Log</summary>

Console objesi iÃ§erisinde `log()` methodunu barÄ±ndÄ±rÄ±r, bu tÄ±pkÄ± `print()` methodu gibi davranÄ±r fakat buna ek olarak bastÄ±rÄ±ldÄ±ÄŸÄ± zamanÄ± da ekrana yansÄ±tÄ±r. Bu duruma ek olarak Rich Syntax Highlighting'de gerÃ§ekleÅŸtirir.
AÅŸaÄŸÄ±da Ã¶rnek kod parÃ§asÄ±:

```python
from rich.console import Console
console = Console()

test_data = [
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "sum", "params": [None, 1, 2, 4, False, True], "id": "1",},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "notify_hello", "params": [7]},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "subtract", "params": [42, 23], "id": "2"},
]

def test_log():
    enabled = False
    context = {
        "foo": "bar",
    }
    movies = ["Deadpool", "Rise of the Skywalker"]
    console.log("Hello from", console, "!")
    console.log(test_data, log_locals=True)


test_log()
```

Ve bu kod parÃ§asÄ±nÄ±n Ã§Ä±ktÄ±sÄ±:

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/log.png)

`log_locals` argÃ¼manÄ±, local olarak bulunan deÄŸiÅŸkenleri tablo olarak ekrana bastÄ±rÄ±r.

</details>
<details>
<summary>Logging Handler</summary>

Python'un logging modÃ¼lÃ¼nÃ¼ de [Handler sÄ±nÄ±fÄ±](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/logging.html) ile formatlayÄ±p renklendirebiliriz.

![Logging](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/logging.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Emoji</summary>

Emojileri de kullanabilirsiniz, kullanÄ±mÄ± markdown emojileri ile aynÄ±.

```python
>>> console.print(":smiley: :vampire: :pile_of_poo: :thumbs_up: :raccoon:")
ğŸ˜ƒ ğŸ§› ğŸ’© ğŸ‘ ğŸ¦
```

Bu Ã¶zelliÄŸi doÄŸru yerlerde kullanmakta fayda var tabii.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tables</summary>

Rich kullanÄ±cÄ±larÄ±na esnek bir [tablo](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tables.html) imkanÄ± sunar, birden fazla ÅŸekilde formatlayÄ±p, stillendirip kullanabilirsiniz.

![table movie](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table_movie.gif)

YukarÄ±daki tablo Ã¶rneÄŸi [table_movie.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/table_movie.py) Ã¶rnek kodu ile oluÅŸturulmuÅŸtur.

Basit bir tablo Ã¶rneÄŸi:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.table import Table

console = Console()

table = Table(show_header=True, header_style="bold magenta")
table.add_column("Date", style="dim", width=12)
table.add_column("Title")
table.add_column("Production Budget", justify="right")
table.add_column("Box Office", justify="right")
table.add_row(
    "Dec 20, 2019", "Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker", "$275,000,000", "$375,126,118"
)
table.add_row(
    "May 25, 2018",
    "[red]Solo[/red]: A Star Wars Story",
    "$275,000,000",
    "$393,151,347",
)
table.add_row(
    "Dec 15, 2017",
    "Star Wars Ep. VIII: The Last Jedi",
    "$262,000,000",
    "[bold]$1,332,539,889[/bold]",
)

console.print(table)
```

Kodun Ã§Ä±ktÄ±sÄ± aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki gibi olmaktadÄ±r:

![table](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table.png)

Note that console markup is rendered in the same way as `print()` and `log()`. In fact, anything that is renderable by Rich may be included in the headers / rows (even other tables).

`Table` sÄ±nÄ±fÄ± kendini terminal ekranÄ±na gÃ¶re ayarlayabilir, geniÅŸletip, kÃ¼Ã§Ã¼ltebilir. Burada bunun ile alakalÄ± bir Ã¶rnek gÃ¶rÃ¼yorsunuz.

![table2](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table2.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Progress Bars</summary>

Uzun iÅŸlerinizi gÃ¶stermek iÃ§in Rich size birden fazla [progress](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/progress.html) bar sunuyor.

Basit bir kullanÄ±m iÃ§in, herhangi bir adÄ±mÄ±nÄ±zÄ± `track` fonksiyonu ile kapsayÄ±p dÃ¶ngÃ¼ye alÄ±n.

```python
from rich.progress import track

for step in track(range(100)):
    do_step(step)
```

AÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki gÃ¶rsellerde de gÃ¶rÃ¼leceÄŸi Ã¼zere birden fazla kez progress bar kullanabilirsiniz, ve dÃ¶kÃ¼mandan da anlaÅŸÄ±lacaÄŸÄ± Ã¼zere bu hiÃ§ de zor bir iÅŸ deÄŸil.

![progress](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/progress.gif)

Kolonlar kullanÄ±cÄ± tarafÄ±ndan ayarlanabilir, indirme hÄ±zÄ±nÄ±, dosya boyutunu yÃ¼zdesel olarak gÃ¶sterimi gibi bir Ã§ok ÅŸekilde gÃ¶sterim saÄŸlayabilir.

![progress](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/downloader.gif)

EÄŸer siz de denemek isterseniz [examples/downloader.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/downloader.py) koduna bakarak ve Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rarak indirme yapabilirsiniz.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Status</summary>

EÄŸer hesaplamanÄ±z gereken uzun iÅŸler varsa ve bunu progress bar ile gÃ¶steremiyorsanÄ±z yardÄ±mÄ±nÄ±za [status](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console.status) methodu yetiÅŸecektir.

```python
from time import sleep
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
tasks = [f"task {n}" for n in range(1, 11)]

with console.status("[bold green]Working on tasks...") as status:
    while tasks:
        task = tasks.pop(0)
        sleep(1)
        console.log(f"{task} complete")
```

YukarÄ±daki kod parÃ§acÄ±ÄŸÄ± aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki gibi bir Ã§Ä±ktÄ± Ã¼retecektir.

![status](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/status.gif)

Spin animasyonu [cli-spinners](https://www.npmjs.com/package/cli-spinners) kÃ¼tÃ¼phanesinden alÄ±nmÄ±ÅŸtÄ±r. `spinner` parametresi ile seÃ§eceÄŸiniz spin ÅŸekilini kullanabilirsiniz. 

```
python -m rich.spinner
```

Ã‡Ä±ktÄ±sÄ± aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki gibi bir sonuÃ§ Ã¼retecektir:

![spinners](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/spinners.gif)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tree</summary>

Rich bir [tree](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tree.html) yapÄ±sÄ±nÄ± yardÄ±mcÄ± Ã§izgiler ile bastÄ±rabilir. Bu yapÄ± bir dosya yapÄ±sÄ±nÄ± gÃ¶stermek iÃ§in veya hiyerarÅŸik veri yapÄ±larÄ±nÄ± gÃ¶stermek iÃ§in kullanÄ±labilir.

Label yapÄ±sÄ± ise basit bir text veya Rich Ã¼zerinde bastÄ±rÄ±labilen her hangi bir yapÄ± olabilir.

```
python -m rich.tree
```

Kodun Ã§Ä±kartacaÄŸÄ± gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼ ÅŸu olacaktÄ±r:

![markdown](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/tree.png)

[tree.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/tree.py) Ã¶rnek dosyasÄ± ile linux'da bulunan `tree` kodunu rich Ã¼zerinden simÃ¼le edebilirsiniz.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Columns</summary>

Rich iÃ§erikleri [kolon](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/columns.html) olarak eÅŸit veya optimal aralÄ±klarla gÃ¶sterebilir.

Burada basit bir `ls` klonunu gÃ¶rÃ¼yorsunz.

```python
import os
import sys

from rich import print
from rich.columns import Columns

directory = os.listdir(sys.argv[1])
print(Columns(directory))
```

YukarÄ±daki yapÄ±ya [columns example](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/columns.py) baÄŸlantÄ±sÄ± Ã¼zerinden ulaÅŸabilirsiniz.

![columns](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/columns.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Markdown</summary>

Rich [markdown](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/markdown.html) stillerini ve Ã§evirme iÅŸlemlerini de ekranda gÃ¶sterebilir.

Sadece yapÄ±lmasÄ± gereken `Markdown` sÄ±nÄ±fÄ±nÄ± import edip, iÃ§eriÄŸini doldurup ekrana bastÄ±rmak.

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.markdown import Markdown

console = Console()
with open("README.md") as readme:
    markdown = Markdown(readme.read())
console.print(markdown)
```

AÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki gibi bir Ã§Ä±ktÄ±ya ulaÅŸacaÄŸÄ±z.

![markdown](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/markdown.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Syntax Highlighting</summary>

Rich iÃ§erisinde [syntax highlighting](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/syntax.html) iÃ§in [pygments](https://pygments.org/) kÃ¼tÃ¼phanesini kullanÄ±yor. TÄ±pkÄ± markdown'da olduÄŸu gibi, bir tane `Syntax` objesi oluÅŸturup bu objeyi terminale bastÄ±rÄ±yoruz.
Ã–rnek:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.syntax import Syntax

my_code = '''
def iter_first_last(values: Iterable[T]) -> Iterable[Tuple[bool, bool, T]]:
    """Iterate and generate a tuple with a flag for first and last value."""
    iter_values = iter(values)
    try:
        previous_value = next(iter_values)
    except StopIteration:
        return
    first = True
    for value in iter_values:
        yield first, False, previous_value
        first = False
        previous_value = value
    yield first, True, previous_value
'''
syntax = Syntax(my_code, "python", theme="monokai", line_numbers=True)
console = Console()
console.print(syntax)
```

YukarÄ±daki kod parÃ§asÄ± aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki gibi bir Ã§Ä±ktÄ± Ã¼retecektir.

![syntax](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/syntax.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tracebacks</summary>

Rich sahip olduÄŸu gÃ¼zel [traceback](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/traceback.html)'ler yaratabilir. BÃ¶ylece daha okunabilir ve daha kolay anlaÅŸÄ±labilen bir yapÄ±ya sahip olursunuz.

Burada OSX Ã¼zerinde (tÄ±pkÄ± Linux gibi) bir traceback Ã§Ä±ktÄ±sÄ± gÃ¶rÃ¼yorsunuz.

![traceback](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/traceback.png)

</details>

TÃ¼m rich yapÄ±larÄ± [Console Protocol](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/protocol.html) kullanÄ±larak gerÃ§ekleÅŸtirilmiÅŸtir, siz de kendi iÃ§eriÄŸinizi Rich'e aktarabilirsiniz.

# Rich CLI

AynÄ± zamanda [Rich CLI](https://github.com/textualize/rich-cli) uygulamasÄ±nÄ± da kontrol edin. Bu uygulama ile konsol Ã§Ä±ktÄ±larÄ±nÄ±zÄ± renklendirebilir, kod Ã§Ä±ktÄ±larÄ±nÄ±za syntax uygulayabilir, markdown gÃ¶sterebilir, CSV dosyasÄ±nÄ± gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼leyebilir ve daha bir Ã§ok ÅŸey yapabilirsiniz.


![Rich CLI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Textualize/rich-cli/main/imgs/rich-cli-splash.jpg)

# Textual

Rich'in kardeÅŸ projesi olan [Textual](https://github.com/Textualize/textual)'a da bir gÃ¶z atÄ±n. Textual ile konsol Ã§Ä±ktÄ±larÄ±nÄ±za bir UI oluÅŸturup, gruplayÄ±p gÃ¶rselleÅŸtirebilirsiniz.

![Textual screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Textualize/textual/main/imgs/textual.png)

[Rich Galeri](https://www.textualize.io/rich/gallery)si Ã¼zerinden, rich kullanÄ±lan son uygulamalara [Textualize.io](https://www.textualize.io) Ã¼zerinden gÃ¶z atabiirsiniz.

EÄŸer siz de projenizi galeriye eklemek istiyorsanÄ±z [bu adÄ±mlarÄ±](https://www.textualize.io/gallery-instructions) takip ederek ekleyebilirsiniz.

## ç›¸å®¹æ€§

Rich å¯åœ¨ Linuxã€macOSã€Windows ä¸Šé‹ä½œã€‚åœ¨æ–°çš„ Windows Terminal ä¸­å¯æ”¯æ´é¡¯ç¤ºå…¨å½©åŠ Emojiï¼Œä½†å‚³çµ±çš„çµ‚ç«¯æ©Ÿä¸­åƒ…æ”¯æ´ 16 è‰²ã€‚Rich æœ€ä½éœ€è¦çš„ Python ç‰ˆæœ¬ç‚º 3.6.3ã€‚

Rich å¯åœ¨ [Jupyter notebooks](https://jupyter.org/) ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œç„¡é ˆé¡å¤–è¨­å®šã€‚

## å®‰è£

ä»¥ `pip` æˆ– PyPI å¥—ä»¶ç®¡ç†å™¨å®‰è£ã€‚

```sh
python -m pip install rich
```

ä»¥æ­¤å‘½ä»¤æ¸¬è©¦ Rich åœ¨çµ‚ç«¯æ©Ÿçš„è¼¸å‡ºæ•ˆæœï¼š

```sh
python -m rich
```

## Rich Print

åŒ¯å…¥ [rich print](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/introduction.html#quick-start) æ–¹æ³•å°±å¯ä»¥è¼•é¬†åœ°è®“ç¨‹å¼é€²è¡Œ rich è¼¸å‡ºï¼Œrich print èˆ‡ Python å…§å»ºçš„å‡½å¼ç”¨æ³•ç›¸ä¼¼ã€‚è©¦è©¦ï¼š

```python
from rich import print

print("Hello, [bold magenta]World[/bold magenta]!", ":vampire:", locals())
```

![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/print.png)

## Rich REPL

Rich å¯ä»¥å®‰è£åœ¨ Python REPL ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æ­¤ä¸€ä¾†å°±å¯ä»¥æ¼‚äº®çš„è¼¸å‡ºèˆ‡çªé¡¯æ¨™ç¤ºä»»ä½•è³‡æ–™çµæ§‹ã€‚

```python
>>> from rich import pretty
>>> pretty.install()
```

![REPL](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/repl.png)

## ä½¿ç”¨ Console

åŒ¯å…¥ä¸¦å»ºæ§‹ [Console](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console) ç‰©ä»¶ï¼Œä»¥æ›´å…¨é¢åœ°æ§åˆ¶ rich çµ‚ç«¯æ©Ÿå…§å®¹ã€‚

```python
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
```

Console ç‰©ä»¶æœ‰å€‹ `print` æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸”åˆ»æ„è¨­è¨ˆçš„èˆ‡å…§å»º `print` å‡½å¼ç›¸ä¼¼ã€‚åƒè€ƒæ­¤ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

```python
console.print("Hello", "World!")
```

å¦‚åŒé æœŸçš„ï¼Œé€™æœƒå°‡ `"Hello World!"` å°åœ¨çµ‚ç«¯æ©Ÿã€‚é ˆæ³¨æ„ä¸åŒæ–¼å…§å»ºçš„ `print` å‡½å¼ï¼ŒRich æœƒè‡ªå‹•å°‡éé•·çš„æ–‡å­—æ›è¡Œï¼Œä»¥ç¬¦åˆçµ‚ç«¯æ©Ÿçš„å¯¬åº¦ã€‚

æœ‰å¹¾ç¨®åŠ ä¸Šé¡è‰²åŠæ¨£å¼çš„æ–¹å¼ã€‚æ‚¨å¯ä»¥ç”¨ `style` å¼•æ•¸è¨­å®šè¼¸å‡ºå…§å®¹çš„æ¨£å¼ï¼Œåƒè€ƒæ­¤ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

```python
console.print("Hello", "World!", style="bold red")
```

è¼¸å‡ºçµæœå¦‚ä¸‹åœ–ï¼š

![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/hello_world.png)

ä»‹ç´¹å®Œäº†å¦‚ä½•å°æ•´è¡Œæ–‡å­—è¨­å®šæ¨£å¼ï¼Œæ¥è‘—ä¾†çœ‹çœ‹æ›´ç´°éƒ¨çš„ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚Rich å¯ä»¥æ¥å—é¡ä¼¼ [bbcode](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BBCode) çš„èªæ³•ï¼Œå°å€‹åˆ¥æ–‡å­—è¨­å®šæ¨£å¼ã€‚åƒè€ƒæ­¤ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

```python
console.print("Where there is a [bold cyan]Will[/bold cyan] there [u]is[/u] a [i]way[/i].")
```

![Console Markup](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/where_there_is_a_will.png)

æ‚¨å¯ä»¥ç”¨ Console ç‰©ä»¶ä¸è²»å¹ç°ä¹‹åŠ›åœ°é”æˆç´°è†©çš„è¼¸å‡ºæ•ˆæœã€‚åƒé–± [Console API](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/console.html) èªªæ˜æ–‡ä»¶ä»¥äº†è§£ç´°ç¯€ã€‚

## Rich Inspect

Rich æä¾›äº† [inspect](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html?highlight=inspect#rich.inspect) å‡½å¼ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°ä»»ä½• Python ç‰©ä»¶ï¼Œå¦‚ classã€instance æˆ– builtin ï¼Œç‚ºå…¶ç”¢ç”Ÿä¸€ä»½å ±å‘Šã€‚

```python
>>> my_list = ["foo", "bar"]
>>> from rich import inspect
>>> inspect(my_list, methods=True)
```

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/inspect.png)

åƒé–± [inspect èªªæ˜æ–‡ä»¶](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html#rich.inspect) ä»¥äº†è§£ç´°ç¯€ã€‚

# Rich å‡½å¼åº«

Rich åŒ…å«äº†ä¸€ç³»åˆ—å¯ç¹ªè£½çš„ç‰©ä»¶ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å®ƒå€‘ä¾†å°å‡ºç²¾ç¾çš„ç•«é¢ï¼Œæˆ–è€…å”åŠ©åµéŒ¯ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ã€‚

æŒ‰ä¸€ä¸‹å­æ¨™é¡Œä»¥äº†è§£ç´°ç¯€ï¼š

<details>
<summary>Log</summary>

Console ç‰©ä»¶æä¾›äº† `log()` æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼èˆ‡ `print()` é¡ä¼¼ï¼Œä½†é‚„å¤šäº†ä¸€æ¬„ä¾†é¡¯ç¤ºç›®å‰æ™‚é–“ã€é€²è¡Œå‘¼å«çš„æª”æ¡ˆåŠè¡Œè™Ÿã€‚é è¨­æƒ…æ³ä¸‹ Rich æœƒèªæ³•é†’ç›®æ¨™ç¤º Python çš„çµæ§‹åŠ repr å­—ä¸²ã€‚è‹¥ä½¿ç”¨æ–¼å­—å…¸æˆ–ä¸²åˆ—é€™é¡é›†åˆæ€§ç‰©ä»¶ï¼ŒRich æœƒå°‡å…¶æ¼‚äº®åœ°å°å‡ºä¾†ï¼Œä»¥ç¬¦åˆå¯ç”¨ç©ºé–“ã€‚æ­¤ç¯„ä¾‹ç¤ºç¯„äº†é€™äº›åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

```python
from rich.console import Console
console = Console()

test_data = [
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "sum", "params": [None, 1, 2, 4, False, True], "id": "1",},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "notify_hello", "params": [7]},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "subtract", "params": [42, 23], "id": "2"},
]

def test_log():
    enabled = False
    context = {
        "foo": "bar",
    }
    movies = ["Deadpool", "Rise of the Skywalker"]
    console.log("Hello from", console, "!")
    console.log(test_data, log_locals=True)


test_log()
```

ä¸Šé¢çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼æœƒç”¢ç”Ÿä¸‹åœ–çµæœï¼š

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/log.png)

æ³¨æ„åˆ° `log_locals` å¼•æ•¸ï¼Œå¯ç”¨ä¾†è¼¸å‡ºä¸€å¼µè¡¨æ ¼ï¼Œç”¨ä¾†é¡¯ç¤º log æ–¹æ³•è¢«å‘¼å«æ™‚ï¼Œå€åŸŸè®Šæ•¸çš„å…§å®¹ã€‚

log æ–¹æ³•å¯ç”¨æ–¼ä¼ºæœå™¨ä¸Šé•·æ™‚é–“é‹ä½œçš„ç¨‹å¼ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¾ˆé©åˆä¸€èˆ¬ç¨‹å¼åµéŒ¯ç”¨é€”ã€‚

</details>
<details>
<summary>Logging Handler</summary>

æ‚¨ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å…§å»ºçš„ [Handler é¡åˆ¥](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/logging.html) ä¾†å°‡ Python logging æ¨¡çµ„çš„è¼¸å‡ºå…§å®¹æ ¼å¼åŒ–ä¸¦è³¦äºˆè‰²å½©ï¼š

<details>
<summary>Emoji</summary>

ä»¥ä¸€å°å†’è™ŸåŒ…ä½è¡¨æƒ…ç¬¦è™Ÿçš„åç¨±ï¼Œä¾†é€é console æ’å…¥ Emojiã€‚åƒè€ƒç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

```python
>>> console.print(":smiley: :vampire: :pile_of_poo: :thumbs_up: :raccoon:")
ğŸ˜ƒ ğŸ§› ğŸ’© ğŸ‘ ğŸ¦
```

è«‹è¬¹æ…ä½¿ç”¨æ­¤åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

<details>
<summary>è¡¨æ ¼</summary>

Rich å¯ä»¥ç”¨ unicode box å­—å…ƒç¹ªè£½å½ˆæ€§çš„ [è¡¨æ ¼](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tables.html)ã€‚æ ¼å¼è¨­å®šååˆ†å¤šå…ƒï¼ŒåŒ…å«æ¡†ç·šã€æ¨£å¼ã€å„²å­˜æ ¼å°é½Šâ€¦â€¦ã€‚

![table movie](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table_movie.gif)

ä¸Šåœ–çš„å‹•ç•«æ•ˆæœæ˜¯ä»¥ [table_movie.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/table_movie.py) ç”¢ç”Ÿçš„ï¼Œè©²æª”æ¡ˆä½æ–¼ examples è³‡æ–™å¤¾ã€‚

åƒè€ƒé€™å€‹ç°¡å–®çš„è¡¨æ ¼ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.table import Table

console = Console()

table = Table(show_header=True, header_style="bold magenta")
table.add_column("Date", style="dim", width=12)
table.add_column("Title")
table.add_column("Production Budget", justify="right")
table.add_column("Box Office", justify="right")
table.add_row(
    "Dec 20, 2019", "Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker", "$275,000,000", "$375,126,118"
)
table.add_row(
    "May 25, 2018",
    "[red]Solo[/red]: A Star Wars Story",
    "$275,000,000",
    "$393,151,347",
)
table.add_row(
    "Dec 15, 2017",
    "Star Wars Ep. VIII: The Last Jedi",
    "$262,000,000",
    "[bold]$1,332,539,889[/bold]",
)

console.print(table)
```

åŸ·è¡Œçµæœå¦‚åœ–ï¼š

![table](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table.png)

è«‹ç•™æ„ï¼Œä¸»æ§å°æ¨™è¨˜çš„å‘ˆç¾æ–¹å¼èˆ‡ `print()`ã€`log()` ç›¸åŒã€‚äº‹å¯¦ä¸Šï¼Œç”± Rich ç¹ªè£½çš„ä»»ä½•æ±è¥¿éƒ½å¯ä»¥è¢«æ”¾åœ¨ä»»ä½•æ¨™é¡Œã€åˆ—ï¼Œç”šè‡³å…¶ä»–è¡¨æ ¼è£¡ã€‚

`Table` é¡åˆ¥å¾ˆè°æ˜ï¼Œèƒ½å¤ è‡ªå‹•èª¿æ•´æ¬„å¯¬ä¾†é…åˆçµ‚ç«¯æ©Ÿçš„å¤§å°ï¼Œä¹Ÿæœƒåœ¨éœ€è¦æ™‚è‡ªå‹•å°‡æ–‡å­—æ›è¡Œã€‚æ­¤ç¯„ä¾‹çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼èˆ‡ä¸Šä¸€å€‹ç›¸åŒï¼Œç„¶è€Œçµ‚ç«¯æ©Ÿè®Šå°äº†ä¸€é»ï¼š

![table2](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table2.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>é€²åº¦æ¢</summary>

Rich å¯ç¹ªè£½å¤šå€‹ä¸é–ƒçˆçš„ [é€²åº¦æ¢](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/progress.html)ï¼Œä»¥è¿½è¹¤éœ€æ™‚è¼ƒä¹…çš„å·¥ä½œã€‚

åŸºæœ¬çš„ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ˜¯å°‡åºåˆ—æ”¾åœ¨ `track` å‡½å¼ä¸­ï¼Œå†å°å…¶çµæœç–Šä»£ã€‚åƒè€ƒæ­¤ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

```python

for step in track(range(100)):
    do_step(step)
```

æ–°å¢å¤šå€‹é€²åº¦æ¢ä¹Ÿä¸æ˜¯é›£äº‹ï¼Œä¾†çœ‹çœ‹èªªæ˜æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

æ‚¨å¯ä»¥èª¿æ•´è¦é¡¯ç¤ºçš„ç‹€æ…‹æ¬„ä½ã€‚å…§å»ºçš„æ¬„ä½åŒ…å«å®Œæˆç™¾åˆ†æ¯”ã€æª”æ¡ˆå¤§å°ã€è®€å¯«é€Ÿåº¦åŠå‰©é¤˜æ™‚é–“ã€‚ä¾†çœ‹çœ‹å¦ä¸€å€‹ç”¨ä¾†é¡¯ç¤ºä¸‹è¼‰é€²åº¦çš„ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

![progress](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/downloader.gif)

æƒ³å˜—è©¦çœ‹çœ‹å—ï¼Ÿæ‚¨å¯ä»¥åœ¨ [examples/downloader.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/downloader.py) å–å¾—æ­¤ç¯„ä¾‹ç¨‹å¼ã€‚æ­¤ç¨‹å¼å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä¸‹è¼‰å¤šå€‹æª”æ¡ˆæ™‚é¡¯ç¤ºå„è‡ªçš„é€²åº¦ã€‚

<details>
<summary>ç‹€æ…‹</summary>

æœ‰äº›ç‹€æ³ä¸‹å¾ˆé›£ä¼°è¨ˆé€²åº¦ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ [status](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console.status) æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•æœƒé¡¯ç¤ºã€Œspinnerã€å‹•ç•«åŠè¨Šæ¯ã€‚è©²å‹•ç•«æ’­æ”¾æ™‚ï¼Œä»å¯æ­£å¸¸æ“ä½œä¸»æ§å°ã€‚åƒè€ƒæ­¤ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

```python
from time import sleep
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
tasks = [f"task {n}" for n in range(1, 11)]

with console.status("[bold green]Working on tasks...") as status:
    while tasks:
        task = tasks.pop(0)
        sleep(1)
        console.log(f"{task} complete")
```

çµ‚ç«¯æ©Ÿçš„é¡¯ç¤ºæ•ˆæœå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

![status](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/status.gif)

è©² spinner å‹•ç•«ä¹ƒå€Ÿç”¨è‡ª [cli-spinners](https://www.npmjs.com/package/cli-spinners)ã€‚å¯ä»¥ç”¨ `spinner` åƒæ•¸æŒ‡å®š spinner æ¨£å¼ã€‚åŸ·è¡Œæ­¤å‘½ä»¤ä»¥é¡¯ç¤ºå¯ç”¨çš„å€¼ï¼š

```
python -m rich.spinner
```

æ­¤å‘½ä»¤åœ¨çµ‚ç«¯æ©Ÿçš„è¼¸å‡ºçµæœå¦‚ä¸‹åœ–ï¼š

![spinners](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/spinners.gif)

<details>
<summary>æ¨¹</summary>

Rich å¯ä»¥ç”¨å°å¼•ç·šç¹ªè£½ä¸€æ£µ [æ¨¹](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tree.html)ã€‚æ¨¹å¾ˆé©åˆç”¨ä¾†é¡¯ç¤ºæª”æ¡ˆçµæ§‹ï¼Œæˆ–å…¶ä»–ç¹¼æ‰¿æ€§çš„è³‡æ–™ã€‚

å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ–‡å­—æˆ–å…¶ä»– Rich èƒ½ç¹ªè£½çš„å…ƒç´ ä½œç‚ºæ¨¹çš„æ¨™ç±¤ã€‚åŸ·è¡Œä¸‹åˆ—ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ä¾†çœ‹çœ‹æ•ˆæœï¼š

<details>
<summary>Markdown</summary>

Rich å¯ä»¥ç¹ªè£½ [Markdown](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/markdown.html) ä¸¦è™•ç†äº†å°‡å…¶è½‰æ›ç‚ºçµ‚ç«¯æ©Ÿæ ¼å¼çš„å¤§é‡å·¥ä½œã€‚

å…ˆåŒ¯å…¥ `Markdown` é¡åˆ¥ï¼Œå†ä»¥å…§å®¹ç‚º Markdown èªè¨€çš„å­—ä¸²å»ºæ§‹ä¸€å€‹ç‰©ä»¶ï¼Œæ¥è‘—å°‡å…¶å°åˆ° consoleã€‚åƒè€ƒæ­¤ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.markdown import Markdown

console = Console()
with open("README.md") as readme:
    markdown = Markdown(readme.read())
console.print(markdown)
```

åŸ·è¡Œçµæœå¦‚ä¸‹åœ–ï¼š

![markdown](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/markdown.png)

<details>
<summary>èªæ³•é†’ç›®æ¨™ç¤º</summary>

Rich ä½¿ç”¨äº† [pygments](https://pygments.org/) å‡½å¼åº«ä¾†å¯¦ä½œ [èªæ³•é†’ç›®æ¨™ç¤º](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/syntax.html) åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼èˆ‡ç¹ªè£½ Markdown ç›¸ä¼¼ï¼Œå…ˆå»ºæ§‹ `Syntax` ç‰©ä»¶ä¸¦å°‡å…¶å°åˆ° consoleã€‚åƒè€ƒæ­¤ç¯„ä¾‹ï¼š

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.syntax import Syntax

my_code = '''
def iter_first_last(values: Iterable[T]) -> Iterable[Tuple[bool, bool, T]]:
    """Iterate and generate a tuple with a flag for first and last value."""
    iter_values = iter(values)
    try:
        previous_value = next(iter_values)
    except StopIteration:
        return
    first = True
    for value in iter_values:
        yield first, False, previous_value
        first = False
        previous_value = value
    yield first, True, previous_value
'''
syntax = Syntax(my_code, "python", theme="monokai", line_numbers=True)
console = Console()
console.print(syntax)
```

åŸ·è¡Œçµæœå¦‚ä¸‹åœ–ï¼š

![syntax](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/syntax.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tracebacksï¼ˆè¿½æº¯ï¼‰</summary>

Rich å¯ä»¥ç¹ªè£½ [æ¼‚äº®çš„ tracebacks](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/traceback.html)ï¼Œç›¸è¼ƒæ¨™æº–çš„ Python traceback é¡¯ç¤ºäº†æ›´å¤šç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ä¸”æ›´å¥½æ‡‚ã€‚æ‚¨å¯ä»¥å°‡ Rich è¨­ç‚ºé è¨­çš„ traceback handlerï¼ˆè™•ç†å¸¸å¼ï¼‰ï¼Œå¦‚æ­¤ä¸€ä¾†æ‰€æœ‰æœªæ¥ä½çš„ä¾‹å¤–éƒ½ç”± Rich å‘ˆç¾ã€‚

å®ƒåœ¨ macOS ä¸ŠåŸ·è¡Œçš„æ•ˆæœå¦‚åœ–ï¼ˆLinux ä¸Šå·®ç•°ä¸å¤§ï¼‰ï¼š

![traceback](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/traceback.png)

</details>

æ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”± Rich ç¹ªè£½çš„ç‰©ä»¶éƒ½ç”¨åˆ°äº† [Console å”å®š](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/protocol.html)ï¼Œæ‚¨ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¾æ­¤å¯¦ä½œè‡ªè¨‚çš„ Rich å…§å®¹ã€‚

# Rich ä¼æ¥­ç‰ˆ

å¯åœ¨ Tidelift è¨‚é–±æ–¹æ¡ˆå–å¾—ã€‚

Rich åŠå…¶ä»–æ•¸ä»¥åƒè¨ˆçš„å¥—ä»¶ç¶­è­·è€…æ­£èˆ‡ Tidelift åˆä½œï¼Œä»¥æä¾›é–‹æ”¾åŸå§‹ç¢¼å¥—ä»¶çš„å•†æ¥­æ€§æ”¯æ´ã€‚æ­¤è¨ˆç•«èƒ½å”åŠ©æ‚¨ç¯€çœæ™‚é–“ã€é¿é–‹é¢¨éšªï¼ŒåŒæ™‚ä¹Ÿè®“å¥—ä»¶çš„ç¶­è­·è€…ç²å¾—å ±é…¬ã€‚[äº†è§£æ›´å¤šã€‚](https://tidelift.com/subscription/pkg/pypi-rich?utm_source=pypi-rich&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=enterprise&utm_term=repo)

# ä½¿ç”¨ Rich çš„å°ˆæ¡ˆ

ä»¥ä¸‹åˆ—å‡ºå¹¾å€‹ä½¿ç”¨ Rich çš„å°ˆæ¡ˆï¼š

- [BrancoLab/BrainRender](https://github.com/BrancoLab/BrainRender)
  a python package for the visualization of three dimensional neuro-anatomical data
- [Ciphey/Ciphey](https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey)
  Automated decryption tool
- [emeryberger/scalene](https://github.com/emeryberger/scalene)
  a high-performance, high-precision CPU and memory profiler for Python
- [hedythedev/StarCli](https://github.com/hedythedev/starcli)
  Browse GitHub trending projects from your command line
- [intel/cve-bin-tool](https://github.com/intel/cve-bin-tool)
  This tool scans for a number of common, vulnerable components (openssl, libpng, libxml2, expat and a few others) to let you know if your system includes common libraries with known vulnerabilities.
- [nf-core/tools](https://github.com/nf-core/tools)
  Python package with helper tools for the nf-core community.
- [cansarigol/pdbr](https://github.com/cansarigol/pdbr)
  pdb + Rich library for enhanced debugging
- [plant99/felicette](https://github.com/plant99/felicette)
  Satellite imagery for dummies.
- [seleniumbase/SeleniumBase](https://github.com/seleniumbase/SeleniumBase)
  Automate & test 10x faster with Selenium & pytest. Batteries included.
- [smacke/ffsubsync](https://github.com/smacke/ffsubsync)
  Automagically synchronize subtitles with video.
- [tryolabs/norfair](https://github.com/tryolabs/norfair)
  Lightweight Python library for adding real-time 2D object tracking to any detector.
- [ansible/ansible-lint](https://github.com/ansible/ansible-lint) Ansible-lint checks playbooks for practices and behaviour that could potentially be improved
- [ansible-community/molecule](https://github.com/ansible-community/molecule) Ansible Molecule testing framework
- +[Many more](https://github.com/textualize/rich/network/dependents)!

FILE: CHANGELOG.md

# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).


## [14.1.0] - 2025-06-25

### Changed

- Removed `typing_extensions` from runtime dependencies https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3763
- Live objects (including Progress) may now be nested https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3768
- Added padding property to Syntax which returns a tuple of four integers https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3782

### Fixed

- Fixed extraction of recursive exceptions https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3772
- Fixed padding applied to Syntax https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3782
- Fixed `Panel` title missing the panel background style https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/3569

### Added

- Added `TTY_INTERACTIVE` environment variable to force interactive mode off or on https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3777

## [14.0.0] - 2025-03-30

### Added

- Added env var `TTY_COMPATIBLE` to override auto-detection of TTY support (See console.rst for details). https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3675

### Changed

- An empty `NO_COLOR` env var is now considered disabled. https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3675
- An empty `FORCE_COLOR` env var is now considered disabled. https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3675
- Rich tracebacks will now render notes on Python 3.11 onwards (added with `Exception.add_note`) https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3676
- Indentation in exceptions won't be underlined https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3678
- Rich tracebacks will now render Exception Groups https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3677

## [13.9.4] - 2024-11-01

### Changed

- Optimizations to cell_len which may speed up Rich / Textual output https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3546

## [13.9.3] - 2024-10-22

### Fixed

- Fixed broken regex that may have resulted in poor performance. https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3535

## [13.9.2] - 2024-10-04

### Fixed

- Fixed `Table` columns not highlighting when added by `add_row` https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/3517
- Fixed an issue with Segment.split_cells reported in Textual https://github.com/Textualize/textual/issues/5090

- Fixed issue with Segment._split_cells https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3506

## [13.8.0] - 2024-08-26

### Fixed

- Fixed `Table` rendering of box elements so "footer" elements truly appear at bottom of table, "mid" elements in main table body.
- Fixed styles in Panel when Text objects are used for title https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3401
- Fix pretty repr for `collections.deque` https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2864
- Thread used in progress.track will exit if an exception occurs in a generator https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3402
- Progress track thread is now a daemon thread https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3402
- Fixed cached hash preservation upon clearing meta and links https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/2942
- Fixed overriding the `background_color` of `Syntax` not including padding https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/3295
- Fixed pretty printing of dataclasses with a default repr in Python 3.13 https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3455
- Fixed selective enabling of highlighting when disabled in the `Console` https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/3419
- Fixed BrokenPipeError writing an error message https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3468
- Fixed superfluous space above Markdown tables https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3469
- Fixed issue with record and capture interaction https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3470
- Fixed control codes breaking in `append_tokens` https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3471
- Fixed exception pretty printing a dataclass with missing fields https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3472

### Changed

- `RichHandler` errors and warnings will now use different colors (red and yellow) https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/2825
- Removed the empty line printed in jupyter while using `Progress` https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2616
- Running tests in environment with `FORCE_COLOR` or `NO_COLOR` environment variables
- ansi decoder will now strip problematic private escape sequences (like `\x1b7`) https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3278/
- Tree's ASCII_GUIDES and TREE_GUIDES constants promoted to class attributes
- `rich.Text.highlight_regex` now accepts a regular expression object https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3347

### Added

- Adds a `case_sensitive` parameter to `prompt.Prompt`. This determines if the
  response is treated as case-sensitive. Defaults to `True`.
- Added `Console.on_broken_pipe` https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/3468

## [12.5.0] - 2022-07-11

### Added

- Environment variables `JUPYTER_COLUMNS` and `JUPYTER_LINES` to control width and height of console in Jupyter
- Markdown friendly `Box` style, `MARKDOWN`, for rendering tables ready to copy into markdown files
- `inspect` will prefix coroutine functions with `async def`
- `Style.__add__` will no longer return `NotImplemented`
- Remove rich.\_lru_cache

### Changed

- Default width of Jupyter console size is increased to 115
- Optimized Segment.divide

### Fixed

- Fix Rich clobbering cursor style on Windows https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2339
- Fix text wrapping edge case https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2296
- Allow exceptions that are raised while a Live is rendered to be displayed and/or processed https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2305
- Fix crashes that can happen with `inspect` when docstrings contain some special control codes https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2294
- Fix edges used in first row of tables when `show_header=False` https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2330
- Fix interaction between `Capture` contexts and `Console(record=True)` https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2343
- Fixed hash issue in Styles class https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2346
- Fixed bug in `Segment.split_and_crop_lines`

## [12.3.0] - 2022-04-26

### Added

- Ability to change terminal window title https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2200
- Added show_speed parameter to progress.track which will show the speed when the total is not known
- Python blocks can now opt out from being rendered in tracebacks's frames, by setting a `_rich_traceback_omit = True` in their local scope https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/2207

### Fixed

- Fall back to `sys.__stderr__` on POSIX systems when trying to get the terminal size (fix issues when Rich is piped to another process)
- Fixed markup escaping issue https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/2187
- Safari - Box appearing around SVG export https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2201
- Fixed recursion error in Jupyter progress bars https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/2047
- Complex numbers are now identified by the highlighter https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/2214
- Fix crash on IDLE and forced is_terminal detection to False because IDLE can't do escape codes https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/2222
- Fixed missing blank line in traceback rendering https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/2206
- Fixed running Rich with the current working dir was deleted https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/2197

### Changed

- Setting `total=None` on progress is now possible, and will display pulsing animation
- Micro-optimization for Segment.divide

## [12.0.0] - 2022-03-10

### Added

- Added options to TimeRemainingColumn to render a compact time format and render elapsed time when a task is
  finished. https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/1992
- Added ProgressColumn `MofNCompleteColumn` to display raw `completed/total` column (similar to DownloadColumn,
  but displays values as ints, does not convert to floats or add bit/bytes units).
  https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/1941
- Replace Colorama with win32 renderer https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/1993
- Add support for namedtuples to `Pretty` https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2031

### Fixed

- In Jupyter mode make the link target be set to "\_blank"
- Fix some issues with markup handling around "[" characters https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/1950
- Fix syntax lexer guessing.
- Fixed Pretty measure not respecting expand_all https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/1998
- Collapsed definitions for single-character spinners, to save memory and reduce import time.
- Fix print_json indent type in `__init__.py`
- Fix error when inspecting object defined in REPL https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2037
- Fix incorrect highlighting of non-indented JSON https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/2038
- Fixed height reset in complex renderables https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/2042

- Improved support for enum.Flag in ReprHighlighter https://github.com/Textualize/rich/pull/1920
- Tree now respects justify=None, i.e. won't pad to right https://github.com/Textualize/rich/issues/1690
- Removed rich.tabulate which was marked for deprecation
- Deprecated rich.align.AlignValues in favor of AlignMethod

## [10.7.0] - 2021-08-05

### Added

- Added Text.apply_meta
- Added meta argument to Text.assemble
- Added Style.from_meta
- Added Style.on
- Added Text.on

### Changed

- Changed `RenderGroup` to `Group` and `render_group` to `group` (old names remain for compatibility but will be deprecated in the future)
- Changed `rich.repr.RichReprResult` to `rich.repr.Result` (old names remain for compatibility but will be deprecated in the future)
- Changed meta serialization to use pickle rather than marshal to permit callables

## [10.6.0] - 2021-07-12

### Deprecated

- Added deprecation warning for tabulate_mapping which will be removed in v11.0.0

- Added precision argument to filesize.decimal
- Added separator argument to filesize.decimal
- Added \_rich_traceback_guard to Traceback
- Added emoji_variant to Console
- Added -emoji and -text variant selectors to emoji code

### Fixed

- Fixed issue with adjoining color tags https://github.com/textualize/rich/issues/1334

### Changed

- Changed Console.size to use unproxied stdin and stdout

## [10.5.0] - 2021-07-05

### Fixed

- Fixed Pandas objects not pretty printing https://github.com/textualize/rich/issues/1305
- Fixed https://github.com/textualize/rich/issues/1256
- Fixed typing with rich.repr.auto decorator

## [10.2.0] - 2021-05-12

### Added

- Added syntax for call, i.e. "Foo(bar)"
- Added Console.measure as a convenient alias for Measurement.get
- Added support for pretty printing attrs objects
- Added mappingproxy to pretty print
- Added UserDict and UserList support to pretty printer

### Changed

- Changed colorama init to set strip=False
- Changed highlighter for False, True, None to not match in the middle of a word. i.e. NoneType is no longer highlighted as None

### Fixed

- Fixed initial blank lines removed from Syntax https://github.com/textualize/rich/issues/1214

## [10.0.1] - 2021-03-30

### Fixed

## [10.0.0] - 2021-03-27

### Changed

- Made pydoc import lazy as at least one use found it slow to import https://github.com/textualize/rich/issues/1104
- Modified string highlighting to not match in the middle of a word, so that apostrophes are not considered strings
- New way of encoding control codes in Segment
- New signature for Control class
- Changed Layout.split to use new Splitter class
- Improved layout.tree
- Changed default theme color for repr.number to cyan
- `__rich_measure__` signature changed to accept ConsoleOptions rather than max_width
- `text` parameter to rich.spinner.Spinner changed to RenderableType

### Added

- Added `__rich_repr__` protocol method to Pretty
- Added rich.region.Region
- Added ConsoleOptions.update_dimensions
- Added rich.console.ScreenUpdate
- Added Console.is_alt_screen
- Added Control.segment, Control.bell, Control.home, Control.move_to, Control.clear, Control.show_cursor, Control.alt_screen
- Added Console.update_screen and Console.update_screen_lines
- Added Layout.add_split, Layout.split_column, Layout.split_row, layout.refresh
- Added new Rich repr protocol `__rich_repr__`

### Fixed

- Fixed table style taking precedence over row style https://github.com/textualize/rich/issues/1129
- Fixed incorrect measurement of Text with new lines and whitespace https://github.com/textualize/rich/issues/1133
- Made type annotations consistent for various `total` keyword arguments in `rich.progress` and rich.`progress_bar`
- Disabled Progress no longer displays itself when starting https://github.com/textualize/rich/pull/1125
- Animations no longer reset when updating rich.status.Status

## [9.6.0] - 2020-12-30

### Changed
